radar_plot.name: Radar Plot
radar_plot.description: This Radar plot displays the scores in all categories of the NIST framework. Slices of the radar chart can be selected to display the corresponding information on the right

stackedAreaChart.name: Stacked Area
stackedAreaChart.description: The stacked area chart displayed here shows the evolution of your score over the last 10 calculations.

right_radar_info.name: Right Info
right_radar_info.description: The 'Right Info' element contains descriptions of what each element of the framework is meant to convey, as well as what their current score is

suggestion_cards.name: Suggestions
suggestion_cards.description: This section displays recommendations on what elements are bringing down your cyber risk score the most and what can be done to fix them
